content: May 3 (Reuters) - UniCredit Chief Executive Andrea Orcel tells media call:

* ASKED ABOUT SLIGHT DECREASE IN DEPOSITS IN THE QUARTER, SAYS BANK IS IN A POSITION TO CHOOSE PROFITABILITY* DEPOSITS' BETA IS CURRENTLY AT 22%* DEPOSITS' BETA NOW SEEN AT 30% IN 2023 VERSUS 35-40% PREVIOUSLY* A NUMBER OF M&amp;A TARGETS ARE POWERED BY SPECULATION BUT AT THESE LEVELS DON'T MAKE ANY SENSE* STRATEGY ON M&amp;A IS "STEADY AS SHE GOES", THERE IS MUCH GREATER VALUE TO BE CREATED BY REPURCHASING BANK'S STOCK THAN IN PURSUING M&amp;A Further company coverage: (Reporting by Milan Newsroom)
